author: Irish Mirror
title: Ground News - Mary McAleese was asked to help stop Catholic primary school protests by meeting loyalists in 2001, state papers reveal
text:
Summary by Irish Mirror It followed several months of riots and disruption linked to the daily protests outside the Catholic primary school for girls where protesters tried to stop schoolchildren and their parents from walking to school Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
